case.title: Fresh Irishman looking to discover the finer sides of London - 24 (london)
case.text: Care to be charmed and enjoyed? I'm a 6"2 slim fun-loving and liberal irish professional who has just moved to London and am looking to find an interesting lady to show me the excitement that this city apparently has to offer. Open to all offers of age or creed as long as you know how to enjoy yourself.
